item.title: Kelly add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies ahead of us are tiny matters compared to what lives within us." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Sai Baba
item.description: "The greatest spiritual practice is to transform love into service" -- Sai Baba

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Shirdi Sai Baba
item.description: "Before you speak ask yourself: Is it kind, is it necessary, it is true, does it improve upon the silence?" -- Shirdi Sai Baba

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "You do not become good by trying to be good, but by finding the goodness that is already within you, and allowing that goodness to emerge. But it can only emerge if something fundamental changes in your state of consciousness." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Awareness is the power that is concealed within the present moment. â€¦ The ultimate purpose of human existence, which is to say, your purpose, is to bring that power into this world." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Gangaji
item.description: "Fufillment has nothing to do with circumstances." -- Gangaji

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "Listen to your life. See it for the fathomless mystery it is. In the boredom and pain of it, no less than in the excitement and gladness: touch, taste, smell your way to the holy and hidden heart of it, because in the last analysis all moments are key moments, and life itself is grace." -- Frederick Buechner
